Red is also used for warning

But here's another interesting fact.

Studies show the red's

In a recent study, US college students
who saw a red participant number

Green is very easy on

A fact makes it ideal for settings

that require concentration,
long work or study sessions.

Additionally, green is

It's common in healthcare settings

Culturally, green

It's also a link to prosperity

Moving on to blue, this

stability, and tranquility.
Today, blue symbolizes loyalty, trust,

and integrity, making

Lighter blues are perceived as calm

On the other hand, darker

Uniforms convey strength

and important roles In modern

blue is used to lower heart

However, blue can also connote

Yellow isn't just bright,

radiating warmth and positivity.
Unlike the cool vibes of red, green,

According to an article by color,

No wonder it's a favorite

It's also used to connote

It's the color that whispers I care,

The last color in our list is gray.
Gray is like the perfect background

that lets other colors

It fits everywhere from old school vibes

It is neutral and balanced,
